post_text: We are pleased to announce the hiring of Mr. Dominic Morlan as our K-12 music teacher beginning in August. Mr. Morlan is a 2018 graduate of Grand Valley State University with a degree in music education and the United States Army School of Music in 2018. Mr. Morlan has experience with vocal and instrumental instruction and his excited about working with our drama students with plays and musicals. Please welcome Mr. Dominic Morlan to the CTA Family!

Today our 5th, 6th, and 7th graders had the opportunity to meet with a local, published author!! Mr. Dave Stricklen worked with them on what it takes to be a creative writer, as well as what it took to write his young adult series. He also announced a new book that will be hitting the shelf soon.
Side note: He was also a winning artist in Grand Rapids Art Prize this year. You can see his work hanging at the Cedar Springs Library by the young adult section.
Thank you Kate Norman and CTA staff for coordinating this awesome opportunity for our @ctachargers students to meet Dave Stricklen! #author #influencer #students #books #writing #marchisreadingmonth #community Michigan's Charter Schools Ferris State Charter Schools
